\Chapter{Cliques}

The following are methods and functions to compute cliques of graphs.

\>CliqueNumber( <G> ) A


\>IsCliqueHelly( <G>, <qtfy> ) O


\>CliqueGraph( <G> ) A
\>CliqueGraph( <G>, <MaxNumCli> ) O


\>Cliques( <G> ) A
\>Cliques( <G>, <MaxNumCli> ) O


\>CompletesOfGivenOrder( <G>, <Ord> ) O
